name: Google Pixel minimal device mockup frames
description:
Flat device frames for Pixel phones by Google, available in front-facing and isometric mockup views.


Do you find this useful? Support my work ➔


Phone models available

  • Pixel 5a 5G
  • Pixel 5
  • Pixel 4a 5G
  • Pixel 4a
  • Pixel 4
  • Pixel 3a
  • Pixel 3
  • Pixel 2
  • Pixel (2016)


———

What's new

  • Added Pixel 5a with 5G


Previous updates

  • Merged all Pixel phone mockup files into one so you don't need multiple files.
  • Added isometric frames for Pixel (2016).
  • Updated sizes of Pixel 5 and 4a 5G for accuracy.
  • Added all known phone color variants as styles for easy swapping.
  • Updated other colors for consistency.
  • Added all regular models from 2016–2020.


  • Recreated and added release version of the 4a wallpaper.
  • Cleaned up Pixel (2016), fixed bezel sizes, and aligned the camera and the earpiece.
  • Fixed the size of the Pixel XL (2016) for scale and updated the color of Really Blue.
